Title: Gryph-hounds
Legend: Gryph-hounds are amongst the noblest Azyrite beasts and have long been companions of the Stormhosts. Their sharp senses are capable of detecting hidden foes, while their fearsome talons are the bane of the unwary.
Intro: Each model in a Gryph-hounds unit is armed with a Vicious Beak and Claws.

Rules.Name: Champion
Rules.Rule: CHAMPION: If this unit has 3 or more models, 1 model in this unit can be a Gryph-hound Alpha. Add 1 to the Attacks characteristics of that modelâ€™s Vicious Beak and Claws.

Rules.Name: Darting Attacks
Rules.Fluff: Gryph-hounds attack in a series of darting strikes.
Rules.Rule: After this unit has fought and all of its attacks have been resolved, it can retreat 6".

Rules.Name: Warning Cry
Rules.Fluff: It is said that it is impossible to sneak up on a Gryph-hound.
Rules.Rule: If an enemy reserve unit or summoned unit (core rules, 3.1) is set up on the battlefield for the first time within 12" of this unit, you can pick up to 3 friendly STORMCAST ETERNALS units wholly within 12" of this unit to shoot. Any shooting attacks made by a STORMCAST ETERNALS unit picked with this ability must target that reserve unit or summoned unit.
